website_summaries.verdict: A low-cost star projector perfect for a baby's room. Creates delicate-looking stars.
pros: This budget projector can shine light in different colors or white light
Rotates quietly and is small enough to fit on a bedside table
Works as a night-light if the dome cover is used
cons: There's no auto-shutoff option and the dome is poor quality

customer_reviews.title: It's very beautiful! I don't have a child and I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: It's very beautiful! I don't have a child and I bought this for myself. It makes my bedroom become more romantic! And the color of lighter can be changed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT Purchase
customer_reviews.text: **Update. The only color that works now is red. Such a disappointment. I already own one that I purchased from another company and it has been working fine for years.*** I really wanted to like this and the colors were brilliant. I purchased it for my child's room. However, the motor is so loud that I have to crank up the volume on the sound machine. The blue light stopped working after a couple of weeks which is a bummer because it was my son's favorite color to see.
customer_reviews.author: Angelinmotion

customer_reviews.title: It is so so so pretty, my kids love it a lot
customer_reviews.text: It is so so so pretty,my kids love it a lot,they told me"mom,I see the sky at home,so pretty "
customer_reviews.author: Sunny zou

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for a tired momma
customer_reviews.text: This night light is a lifesaver. My little one never liked to sleep in her bed because it was so dark, so she was constantly in my bed. Other night lights I've tried were either too much light, or not enough. My little girl also loves stars, so that was a huge plus. This machine has different color combinations and it has an option to move around the room. I would definitely buy this product for a birthday gift or baby shower gift. The only thing that doesn't work sometimes is the off button, but then I just unplug it, so I wouldn'treally say it's a downside because easily fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Sara M.

customer_reviews.title: Simply Magical
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I bought this amazing ball of stardust it has been incorporated into my nightly routine to turn it on as I fall asleep. I love how many options you have to choose from for color and the way it spins around really makes it magical. It's also handy that it works with my old phone charger head as an adaptor, though it has a battery option so either way It would have been fine. This star projector was such a great addition to my star/celestial themed room and I encourage anyone else who might be considering to buy to buy <3
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this. It was a little tricky ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. It was a little tricky to figure out and the included instructions were limited. But my son is a huge fan! UPDATE (9/16/16): due to the weird positioning of the plug (it's in the front), the cord has frayed. It eats through batteries really quickly, so this was a major bummer. In addition both the green and white lights have stopped working. Given that we bought this in July, we had expected it to work a bit longer. I guess you get what you pay for. Additional update: company offered full refund or new product which I found generous given the product was not new. So I have increased my star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy P.

customer_reviews.title: Updated - Cheap but still okay, no off button
customer_reviews.text: My son likes this light a lot. It spins and puts nice stars and moons on the ceiling. It has no off switch with is annoying. The under dome is a cheap plastic that would be easy to break for a young child. So put it out of reach. With the diffuser dome on it still lights up a room a good bit so you can see things, my son prefers it off. Update 4 months later: The green LED burned out. It seems to make more noise when spinning too.
customer_reviews.author: ASReview

customer_reviews.title: DOA, motor doesn't work, pcb board damaged, cheap
customer_reviews.text: This didn't work correctly, it seems like the pcb board was damaged/broken. In the picture it is the corner piece. I could hear the piece rattling around inside. This caused the light to not be functional at all. Really cheap design, I can see why so many other people reported this not working after a short period of time. Stay away, there are better options for this type of device that will probably last longer. Check the reviews, lots are reporting this stops working.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Kills Kills Kills batteries
customer_reviews.text: A set of 4x AA batteries will last less than one night. Either rechargeable or alkaline. There is no timer mode and the buttons are un-intuitive and not well labeled. Also, you can't tell if they are on or off (two detent on or off, one is a momentary). As far as the light goes, it projects nicely and you have the option of diffusing the light with the cover. There is an included USB power cord if you can get USB power to the middle of your child's room.
customer_reviews.author: Bessy

customer_reviews.title: Best nightlight EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it's portable once charged up by the USB plug. The variety of colors, it spins around quietly, and can also be still and turns off whenever your not using it. Depending on.how you position it in a room it lights up every corner with moons and plenty of stars. Only thing thing would of made this bad boy better was if it played some soft lullabye music....but without it its still the best night light EVER for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry324

customer_reviews.title: Can't plug directly into the wall, and kills batteries
customer_reviews.text: The cable they give you to charge it plugs into a usb port. So unless you have a converter of your own, you aren't going to plug it into the wall to charge. I used this as a night light for my son to go to sleep. It was left on for an hour, and then one of us went into his room to turn it off. By the second night, the batteries were completely dead. I had pud fresh batteries straight from a new pack into the light. Spend the money and by a better one. You'll end up saving money, because you won't have to buy batteries 4 times a week.
customer_reviews.author: LunaLightfoot

customer_reviews.title: Faulty electronics.
customer_reviews.text: My son loved the pattern and colors. But the dome tops fall off absurdly easily. When it arrived, the original Amazon batteries were dead. I replaced them and it ran okay. But it would stop working if you plugged it in. My husband took it apart and did some internal repairs, and he got the plug to work. Now the on/off switch has stopped working. It has only been 2 weeks since it arrived. I would not purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Maui Girl

customer_reviews.title: The kids love this light machine
customer_reviews.text: The kids love this light machine. We have had it for over a week now and they still get excited when we turn it on a bed time. It does use up batteries quickly though. It takes 4 AA batteries and after it being on for one night the machine was off by morning and they wee dead. I have since used the cord it came with to plug it in. Although it does not come with an actual plug just a cord. I was able to use a plug to something else for them. i do wish they came with the plug, if they did these would be unbeatable! Totally recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: stacey

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My baby daughter really loves these lights. Product is a little flimsy but what do you expect for such a cheap price and how long are you really going to use it anyway. I leave it on rotation constantly and after a little while it starts making a noise when it rotates but maybe that's because I leave it on too long. Either way, this keeps babies entertained and the stars and moon look cool on the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Kate S

customer_reviews.title: No on and off buttons. Really???
customer_reviews.text: There is no on/off button on this thing. I cannot judge the quality yet but it's working. But for sure, this won't last for years. The dome topples easily, but can be refit. The way this dome is designed, it is better to place in centre of room, else you cannot see the projections clearly. My son is in love with it and figured out button combinations to turn it on and off, its way beyond my understanding.
customer_reviews.author: Bhavana

customer_reviews.title: Very loud, must be close to wall to see
customer_reviews.text: The light has to be practically no more than three feet from the ceiling to even see the shapes. They quickly become unrecognizable blobs from further away. Also, the unit makes a pretty terrible, loud, mechanical noise when it rotates. My daughter refuses to have it spin because she can't fall asleep (neither can I from across the hall!) with that awful noise. I also do not like the way the unit has lasers inside, instead of bulbs. I have to turn my head away from it when it's on, otherwise the piercing light gives me a headache if a beam gets in my eye. Which it does if you dare to look at the unit while it's on.
customer_reviews.author: Itscalledkarma

customer_reviews.title: Spend the money on w better one
customer_reviews.text: Item broke within ten minutes of using, poorly made. The effect was pretty but not for ten minutes! One of the wires inside came loose which caused it to stop working altogether Update: I was contacted by the store associated via email multiple times. They apologized for the bad product and said "They didn't want to be the bad child who always got yelled at", whatever that means, and offered me a refund. I thanked them and accepted. Except I never received a refund. I did receive more emails asking me to remove my negative review but no refund... go figure. Stay away from this seller and product!
customer_reviews.author: becky

customer_reviews.title: Overall my kids loved it. It had no music which I liked ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received mine today and had to call the customer service to get a refund. The projector was leaking oil from it and Am not sure if this supposed to happen but it didn't look normal. Overall my kids loved it. It had no music which I liked but I think it would have been nice if it had some kid of sounds to it
customer_reviews.author: Lubna

customer_reviews.title: Missing adapter cord???
customer_reviews.text: I didn't receive a cord for plug in. From pictures and description and other reviews i was under the impression I would get a cord with it, just needed my own charging block. I had a charger block waiting for when it arrived, I don't have any batteries on hand, so I am unable to even test it out.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver For My Son With Anxiety and Developmental Delay
customer_reviews.text: So my son is 6 1/2, he has developmental delay and has horrible anxiety about bed time and he is scared of the dark, after trying several different night lights and having a tent for his bed..... this was a life saver! All the different light color options were wonderful and when you have it rotating it’s slow enough to still be calming and not over stimulate him. Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Asrielle R.

customer_reviews.title: white LED went out
customer_reviews.text: My baby has only been sleeping in her nursery for 5 months when this happened. We were told they'd send us a replacement after we sent this one back but the process could take a couple months. I was disappointed. This is my 11 month old's night light. What would we do?! They also said they havent heard of the white light not working anymore...almost as if I wasnt telling the truth. It did stop rotating on me one night, but after messing with it, I got it to rotate again. It's quite cheaply made, but we love it and it's a good purchase for the price. I hope none of the other lights go out.
customer_reviews.author: teacher_z14

customer_reviews.title: The videos look amazing but did not look like that at home very ...
customer_reviews.text: This did not work for me it's not even noticeable in the room. The light only stays on red and it did not come with a cord! The videos look amazing but did not look like that at home very disappointed. ******** please read******** The thing with this is the batteries ! If you use the wire and connect it to an outlet it's perfect ! I thought mines was broken but it's not, it's the batteries that makes the light in the product less bright if that makes sence.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool unless it breaks.
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty cool, works great, or at least it did for about 4 months (my baby is 4 months old).... The color lights stopped coming on (the white light stopped coming on after 1 month but I didn't really mind). I took it apart, and of course it is some circuit chip which invariably broke itself somehow even though we've never dropped it, etc. But, like I said, it's pretty cool (5 stars), unless it breaks (1 star). This review is an average of both.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Elder

customer_reviews.title: No power adapter and a piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: This is very cheaply made (as in it should only cost $5 or less), does not have an auto shut-off, burns up battery life after just a few uses, comes with a very small instruction booklet that has been poorly translated into English, and didn’t even come with a power adapter (just a USB cord, but no way to plug it into the wall; why would I leave it plugged into a computer all night?
customer_reviews.author: R. Farnsworth

customer_reviews.title: Colored lights stopped working with minimal use
customer_reviews.text: This thing has less than one hour of use time. We’ve turned it on a couple times just because it looked cool. We’ll sometimes turn it on for a few minutes at night and our 4 month old. As I’ve said we’ve probably used it less than one hour in total. Now without warning when turning it on only the white lights will show. When clicking the middle button the colored lights with very dimly show for the instant the button is clicked. Going to return this item. Was reading through the. Q&A and a few people have similar issues. Seems quality control is pretty poor.
customer_reviews.author: J V

customer_reviews.title: Annoying controls, not easy to turn off and on.
customer_reviews.text: The stars are great. Nice colors, spins nicely but the buttons to operate are frustrating to use and cheap and also the plug attachments is in an aweful location. Lastly, I wish there was an easier way to turn it off and on. I would have to push the button until it gets through all the lighting options before it just turns off so I unplug it each time I want to turn it on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Ccarol80

customer_reviews.title: Not designed for a baby's room
customer_reviews.text: Very cool projector, but not practical as an advertised baby night light because it has no timer on it. This unit will run until you physically turn it off. There are similar star projectors out there that have nice timers on them, which make a lot more sense in a baby's room. I would recommend this product if you are using it for any other purpose than in a baby's room.
customer_reviews.author: FL

customer_reviews.title: I love the different light options but I really wish that ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the different light options but I really wish that they had provided a longer power cord. There are not a lot of options on where to put it in the room because the power cord is probably three to four feet long. In addition it both looks cheap and is easily damaged by a child who touches it. The top is really just a flimsy plastic that can be crushed with a toddlers finger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler really loves this nightlight - every night she talks about how "magical" her room is! It's a small light, but projects well (if you take off the white, removable cover). We don't use the spinning feature at night since it's a little too exciting, but it seems to work well, with a soft white noise sound. The lights are great though, works just as we hoped!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Corn

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money! Terrible product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a terribly cheaply made projector. Do not waste your money on this. The cord we received was broken into two so we can't even see if it works and furthermore the top pops off it is moved even an inch I'm returning this and will not be ordering from this Global Vista ever again. .
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent product for the price. The top, with the star cut outs is pretty flimsy and has gotten crushed a few times by my overzealous toddler but I can usually pop it back out with minimal damage. A huge negative is the amount of batteries this thing takes, and how fast they die. It won't last more than a few hours if using batteries so make sure you use the wall plug if you plan on using often or for a long period of time. Overall my toddler enjoys it and it is a good deal for the price. It does put off a good amount of light for a "night light".
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Been on 24/7 for a solid year and still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: 4 year old loves it. Lights up his bedroom, but he loves taking it into his play tent with him too. Big hit. UPDATE: I wanted to update this because it's been a year since we plugged this into my son's room and it has NEVER BEEN SHUT OFF. It's on 24/7. He can't sleep without it now and it's still going strong. It's been dropped countless times and still works just fine. Very happy with this purchase even a year later.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Rouse

customer_reviews.title: Good but Easier on/off would be great...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves looking up at this, but it’s extremly Light so when you go to plug in the cord or click any button you must have 2 hands—which as a mom at 2a with a crying baby...you don’t always have!! I wish it had suction cups to stay in place and easier on/off button...Instead I lightly keep the plug in so I hardly have to push it to turn on, but then it sometimes falls out during action.
customer_reviews.author: Morvarid Ebrahimi

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: I like that it plugs into the wall, no battery changing for me. However I have 2 of them and they both have had seperate failures, 1 the base stopped rotating but the lights work fine, the other one all the colored lights quit so now can only have spinning white lights. I was initially very impressed with these, and the kids absolutely loved them while they worked, But as aforementioned they didn't last long, maybe a month. I wouldn't buy again at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The unit itself seems cheap, but it’s very calming and overall a good product. My only issue with it is I dropped it into the crib on accident, less then a foot onto a soft surface, and the middle button wouldn’t work anymore until we took it apart and put it back together. My son loves this thing though. He stares at it whenever he wakes up.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Fear

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Could not figure out the magic combo of buttons to tie the darn thing off. Spins too fast- is dizzying and I did not like it for my baby. Also it ended up breaking after a week.
customer_reviews.author: EVO SVO

customer_reviews.title: A little flimsy but does the job
customer_reviews.text: It's on the flimsy side, but does the job. My 6-yr old loves looking at the stars, and he kept asking me to paint constellations on his ceiling. That seemed quite time consuming for a phase that might not last. He likes the light, and the phase is not as fleeting as I thought. As he gets a little older and the more he's into the space and science, he may become dissatisfied because the constellations are not accurate. Not an issue yet, and I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: flygirl

customer_reviews.title: They love that it rotates
customer_reviews.text: This night light is pure MAGIC for my children! They love that it rotates, they can change the color combinations, and it is very soothing. It stays on all night unless I turn it off, which is what I was looking for for them, so that is a huge plus for us! The only thing keeping this from being 5 stars is that I wish there were a separate power button just to turn it on and off by. But other than that, this is a wonderful nightlight for my kids!
customer_reviews.author: Amber R Forry

customer_reviews.title: "color changing", ya the first time you use it only
customer_reviews.text: Turned it on and enjoyed. Turned it off to continue with day. Finally had a chance to try again, only one color worked. No longer changes colors to anything other than normal light. Only changed to blue light before. Stars still rotate and normal light will work but the extra colors are gone and makes me sad. Bought as present and by the time I left it was no longer working properly.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift to my daughter for her 9th birthday and I wouldn't be happier. When I took it out the package to make sure all the parts worked before giving it to her, I plugged it in and was in AWE of how well it lit up my dark room. The setting are easy to set, and it has a nightlight mode that I love. I was so excited about it, I woke her from her sleep to come look, and it wasn't even her birthday yet. I'll be sure to buy another because I know my other daughter will want one.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Mack

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, but fun
customer_reviews.text: Just unboxed this projector so I can't speak to durability. Build quality is very cheap. The light/color options are fun, but the rotation motor is quite loud, but not consistent enough to be good white noise. You can't plug it in to a regular outlet, it comes with a very short USB cable that you could plug in to a cell charger or computer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Starry starry night!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year-old son loves this thing. He now needs it on at night when we go to sleep. I took one star off because the thin plastic globe is very fragile and can easily break. My son accidentally kicked it off my night stand and it fell down on the floor and broke off a piece of the globe. I tape it up with black gorilla tape and it's still functioning.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Y.

customer_reviews.title: Could be better. Baby like it though
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cheap a material-wise but it worked well so it wasn't a big deal. My son really liked it but the red light already stopped working after a few month so that's disappointing. Drains batteries like crazy so better to just plug in. Would be nice if it used a typical micro USB cable instead of this random one so I could plug it without worrying about losing the cable.
customer_reviews.author: The Little Mogul Toy Reviews

customer_reviews.title: So the "stars" on this are really amazing and mesmerizing
customer_reviews.text: So the "stars" on this are really amazing and mesmerizing. After awhile the motor on the turning function does start to be a bit more noisy but it's not bad. My son also ripped apart the top piece to see how it all works and I had to fix it as best I could, so know that the cover is fragile. But we still use it every night.
customer_reviews.author: shellcollectingamelia7

customer_reviews.title: Cute... but didn’t last
customer_reviews.text: We got this item for my toddler who loved the colors, rotation and overall night light. It lasted a month. Battery life would only last a night and it required new batteries... which was fine as we kept it on all night. We had the plug attachment which worked fine. We are a now a month in and the colored light part doesn’t work any longer. I’m lucky I can get it on. The rotation is hit or miss. I don’t think it will last another month. My suggestion: look elsewhere. Get another night light. I have to get a new one, but will not be repurchasing this one.
customer_reviews.author: GenevievePB

customer_reviews.title: Had it for two weeks then it broke
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this thing, my 2 year old son did too. He would ask me to sit on his bed with him to watch the moving stars, which were a little blurry but I didn't mind since he lived it so much. Just yesterday the thing had trouble spinning, so now the stars don't move anymore. I guess I can't really complain, I got what I paid for. If you want something that will last, spend more money.
customer_reviews.author: Curran H. Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Cute - But Just OK
customer_reviews.text: The images it projects (stars and moon) are not as clear as it appears in the photo. I have moved it around, elevated it - nothing seems to make them look at clear as it does in the picture. My son thinks it is neat though and it does not get hot through the night - which I was worried about leaving it on all night. It does not come with a plug but rather comes with a USB cord and you have to supply your own plug. I wouldn't buy it again but it will serve its purpose for now.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: While he does love it, the blue light already went out (I ...
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this for my son who is a month old. He was fascinated by the lights on the Christmas tree. Once Christmas ended we decided to purchase this to keep his attention. While he does love it, the blue light already went out (I got it yesterday). I’m just disappointed with a fault product. (Update) green went out too! (A hour after typing the review)
customer_reviews.author: ashley lee

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy, even I enjoy it!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his stars! We use it while in the bathtub or chilling on the back porch at night. We also use it for his bedroom nightlight sometimes. It’s really neat all the options for colors and if they move or not etc.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one for my son and I returned it because it made a very loud sound. I ordered another one because my son liked it, and guess what? after two days of using it, the buttons don't work and I can't change the colors. it got stuck in the red light and my son's favorite colors are green and blue. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: LunaSol

customer_reviews.title: Loved it when it worked well
customer_reviews.text: Had less than month and white lights are out already and makes a noise when rotating. Waiting on it to break completely and promised my 3 yr old i'd get him a new light (not this one though). Loved it when it worked well. Just cheap....expected with the price though. UPDATE: customer service contacted me regarding the issue and will be providing a refund. They were very quick to contact me and follow-up on the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stars Are Great, But Cheap Quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this is SOOOOOO BAD. Make sure that you dont move it or touch it. There isn't an off switch so you have to unplug it and plug it every time which is annoying. I like that it lets you choose the color, but it should give an option whee it switches from each color like the Vicks starry night.
customer_reviews.author: GabyStaas

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I received this product three days ago and my kids use it when they first go to bed then I turn it off a little while later. Today when they went to turn it on, non of the colored lights were working. The white light still works but I don’t have high hope that it will last much longer. Not worth buying!
customer_reviews.author: Rayzer

customer_reviews.title: Help in deciding.
customer_reviews.text: 3.5 stars Here's why. The product itself is good. My 4 yr old loves it especially with 2 two colors. Depending on how close the light is to the wall will determine the clearness of the stars. Further away stars are blurry but that does not effect my son. It would frustrate the parent or adult if used for them. One other slight frustrating thing is the cord, it's "just" long enough to sit on my son's dresser so location is slim pickings. If you can handle those two things then the product will work for you.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: I want to LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: I want to LOVE this product. However, I have one major complaint. The lid does NOT stay on. You can turn it to lock it, but it easily pops off, which isn't a huge problem except the bulbs to the light are right there. I have to keep my up high away from my boys, bc they can easily take that lid off. I love the colors and it is super calming. Make sure you have a USB cord to plug it in if you plan to leave it on all night. After 2 days the batteries will die.
customer_reviews.author: Nickie

customer_reviews.title: Small size big impact
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp for my son who is autistic. He really likes it! The material is plastic but seems to be holding up pretty well. It is a plug in unit that my son keeps on all the time. We have had it almost a year now and it seems to be working just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Michele P. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Dropped to three stars after use
customer_reviews.text: Update after 4 Months. It keeps shifting out and turning off and I have to wiggle the cord for it to work. I tried another plug and still have the issue. My one year old absolutely loves this. He smiles so big when we turn it on every night and it helps him actually sleep through the night! No more being scared of the dark!
customer_reviews.author: Mom.Nurse.Wife.08

customer_reviews.title: Annoying Starry Blur projection light
customer_reviews.text: I personally only think this product deserves 1 star, but I adding another for the fact that my 5 year old really liked the lamp. It doesn't come with a wall plug, which is annoying. It's hard to turn off, also annoying. My main gripe is that the stars on the walls/ceiling are out of focus. It's mostly just a starry blur revolving around the room. Wouldn't recommend this and would have returned it if my daughter hadn't destroyed the packaging when she opened it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lights stopped working after about 10 all night uses.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in April.I have used it maybe 10 times (albeit all night) and the colored lights are working inconsistently. They will flicker or go out entirely. The green, red and blue aren't working properly. The only light that is dependable is the regular white light and that's not as entertaining for a 5 month old. I gave this 3 stars instead of one because when it worked properly it was beautiful and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ceceliajane

customer_reviews.title: The product was ok initially, but it did not ...
customer_reviews.text: The product was ok initially, but it did not work with batteries after I occasionally used it in the first month. I tried to replace with new batteries, but it did not work at all. Now, it only works with USB, which is quite inconvenient. There is some concern about the quality and durability. That's why I just gave the item two stars. If I knew this issue in advance, I would not purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: HLM

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! My son stares at the stars all the time and it helps him fall asleep. The placement of it is kind of hard because if you don’t place it in the right spot then you won’t see very many starts but you also have to keep the lights out of their eyes because it’s almost blinding from how bright it is. Just be careful! Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Bell

customer_reviews.title: Cool nightlight
customer_reviews.text: Besides not having a timer for automatic shut off, this thing is a great night light. It covers all the walls if placed in center of room. The lights are pretty and my kid likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Felish T

customer_reviews.title: Have owned this unit since Oct and it's pretty much dead and barely functional
customer_reviews.text: Have owned this unit since Oct and it's pretty much dead and barely functional. About 2 months in the white LED stopped working and now there appears to be some sort of short in the power connector on the unit. Also comes with a USB cable to power it but no actual adapter that plugs in to the wall so you have to use an existing USB adapter to use the unit. Would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Diana Gamiz

customer_reviews.title: My son falls asleep without crying
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new nightlight for my son and this one is very colorful and projects nicely. I plug it in over using batteries. Lots of settings and it rotates. My son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: christina younkin

customer_reviews.title: Pass on it
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it is what it is. Having said that, the controls are not user friendly at all. I kept trying to get it to set to just one light on, but it kept going to multi-lights which are way too bright. The top is also super flimsy-- it would not have survived a baby's room for long. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: jkrispies

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son...he loves it! It's a lot brighter than his old one and it rotates. Only down side is it doesn't have a timer(that I have figured out). Upside it comes with a USB plug so I dont have to change the batteries every day. It would be 5 starts if it had a timer on it. Besides that perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: So cool!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my nephew for his birthday. I got kind of worried cause when I told my family about it they didn't think he sounded that "cool." I guess the night of his birthday party he tried it out with the family and he thought it was AMAZING! He even said "this is my favorite birthday present ever!!" A reaction like that is priceless, and I only had to spend $15!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie

customer_reviews.title: This isn't the best projector. You can only see the stars if ...
customer_reviews.text: This isn't the best projector. You can only see the stars if it's right up against the wall. The stars on the ceiling are very blurry, so they kind of just look like dim blobs of light. I still use it, but it would have been better if the stars were clear :/ I took off the outside shell too, and still not clear.
customer_reviews.author: kansascity

customer_reviews.title: Nice night light for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great night light for what it is advertised as. Makes a nice starry sky on the ceiling. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Cute nightlight.
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old great granddaughter was thrilled with her gift and her parents were pleased also. It gives a soft ambient light for a child's room and gives them comfort without keeping them awake. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: S Barnhart

customer_reviews.title: Nice light
customer_reviews.text: His nightlight provide a sufficient amount of light for a child/toddler. In addition to the brightness the nightlight could be set to rotate. The nightlight takes AA batteries. The power cord is kinda short also. I use a power pack to supply power through USB rather than the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Davis

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: I migh have waited too long for a refund because I'm lazy and have other thigs to do but this piece of garbage crapped out within a week. Colored lights wont stay on AND wont cycle through different colors. Doesn't matter if I use just batteries or the plug or both together. Hunk. Of. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like this.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this... but unfortunately it's just not a well thought out product. The controls are overly complicated for what it does... why is there no On/Off? Instead- you have to make sure the other functions are turned off before being able to switch it off. Not a huge deal... but too complicated for a toddler... almost too complicated for his mom! Bigger problem is it seems to be draining batteries. We loaded it up with new batteries on Christmas day and a week later, after only maybe 4 (10-15 min.) uses, it is dead. Wish I could return it but I already tossed the box :(
customer_reviews.author: Emily F Miller

customer_reviews.title: My son love it.
customer_reviews.text: We have had it for a little while and my son loves it. Unfortunately the motor has stopped working and the stars no longer spin. Hopefully we can get it apart and try to fit it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Pisa

customer_reviews.title: Best of 3 different brands I bought here on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 of these kinds of lights - the top 3 Amazon sells in fact. This one is by far the family favorite (beautiful wife, 9 YO boy and 3 YO girl). FAR brighter and much cooler to look at vs. the "wave pattern" given off by the other 2. Yes, it feels cheap. Yes, it squeaks on occasion. But it is far better to look at and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: 44 Year Old Male

customer_reviews.title: I brought the night like March 27 and its now April 15th
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews, i went a head and bought this for my 3 year old. It hasnt even been a month and it has stopped working. I brought the night like March 27 and its now April 15th. My toddler is so disappointed. Do not purchase this. It doesnt last long at all.
customer_reviews.author: Okiessmile95

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much, maybe more than my kids do. I thought it was broken at first until I realized there is a lid that makes it blurry. Not sure why this lid even exists, it’s never used and will probably disappear into the abyss that is my house. Very cool light!!!
customer_reviews.author: CloverQueen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing nightlight too bad it stopped turning after a week
customer_reviews.text: Its a great night light. My daughter loves the colorful stars. U can use the usb or batteries to power it on. The stars and moon have different colors-red green yellow blue. We loved that it was turning around and inside the room with the lights out-its amazing to see-my daughter loved it. Unfortunately, after a week it stopped turning and some of the buttons dont work anymore..
customer_reviews.author: Luchi

customer_reviews.title: Could be better, but still pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: This works pretty good for me. It makes a quiet and high pitched noise on some settings and I personally don't like how fast it rotates. I often forget to turn it off and it is still going strong a few months later, so especially if you are older and just like the stars this is a pretty good night light for you! I like the green light the best.
customer_reviews.author: M. Neale Stoddard

customer_reviews.title: otherwise i wouldn't recommend this. for older child i guess it should ...
customer_reviews.text: light is too bright and even as adult i wouldnt look at the light directly as it kind of blind my eye. consider I bought this for my 3 years old we worried that she would keep stare at it and damage her eye. unless you can place this in a area where toddlers cant reach, otherwise i wouldn't recommend this. for older child i guess it should be fine
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Cool product except it will not last more than a month of use.
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool product but i have purchased two of these now and they have both died within a month time frame. The first one some of the colors went out and this one all of the colors except for white do not work.
customer_reviews.author: coreyk85

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: Amazing how this simple yet beautiful light has improved my life. I mean it. My daughter is 3 months old and she loves it. Keeps her entertained in the morning and makes her very sleepy at night. It also arrived a lot earlier than it said it would. You can either plug it in an iphone/ipad type cube to start it or you can use batteries. I love it & I Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Monika Ilieva

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but quality is lacking...
customer_reviews.text: My 6yo daughter loves this as a night light. That said, I do not give it that rating. When you enable the option for it to rotated around, it becomes very loud. If you want something that gives off a "white noise" like sound then I guess it's a two for one deal. For me I find the noise to be a sign of a cheap device that will likely stop working in a few months. For now it works, but we will see how long.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Nice,  bright,  a lot of motion
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves it. The light it puts out is intense, a lot of motion and variety of color. The spinning part can be loud and seems to get louder as it gets older. But it has a blinking setting, so the spinning part is not completely necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Comilla

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. I will be ordering another one to ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the grand kids when they spend the night....but...I use it every night!!!! Very soothing and helps me fall asleep. Amazing product. I will be ordering another one to use with the Christmas tree!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Groovy Taterbug

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This thing fell apart when I opened it cheaply made for sure not worth your money . broke within 2 weeks of getting it . don't buy this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and breaks quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these less than a month ago. One of the LEDs burnt out within the first week. So then I returned and replaced it with a third. Now I have 2 lamps and both have burnt out LEDs. Cheap Chinese manufacturing. Can't even last a month. What a waste!
customer_reviews.author: Linda F.

customer_reviews.title: Love it, my 4 yr old son actually stays ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, my 4 yr old son actually stays in his room at night now. I wish I have thought of getting something like this a long time ago. Works better if you were to keep it plugged into the wall. I noticed with batteries, it'll die sitting 3-4 days.
customer_reviews.author: NINJA

customer_reviews.title: Like and not like
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift and I love the light, but we can never figure out to turn off the lights. We have to keep hitting all the buttons over and over again to get it to turn off. Because of that, the batteries wear out really fast.
customer_reviews.author: jflowe

customer_reviews.title: Great nightlight
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for 2 years and still going strong. Our kiddo loves it. Just bright enough on the ceiling to show stars, but not light up the whole room. We keep it on the blue and green stars and no motion.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Boxleiter

customer_reviews.title: Toy like
customer_reviews.text: This star gadget projects celestial images in 4 different settings The multi color setting is the only one I kinda like the rest were blurred and seem to move too fast around the ceiling!!! As Seen on TV star projector works much better!! Though it's made for out doors it works just as well on your bedroom ceiling!!!
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Broken already!!!
customer_reviews.text: Only had this for a short period of time and the colors and rotation no longer work! I expected better. Maybe mine is faulty but I can not say I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Davis

customer_reviews.title: Really Cool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a year ago for myself, and I love it. So, my sister thought it was really cool, so I bought one for her, and she loves it. The package arrived on time, and there were no issues. Great gift for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Merryliz

customer_reviews.title: Great projector, poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: First off, it's an awesome projector. My five year old loved it. The quality is the reason for the low rating. Hers stopped rotating within a few months and now has completely stopped working within 6 mo. I purchased another as a gift and upon opening the box, it didn't rotate right away. Amazon/seller were great about refunding and sending a new one, but the gifted one has also stopped working within a few months. Poor quality, but cute.
customer_reviews.author: turquoisejo

customer_reviews.title: I think it works pretty alright the stars aren't super clear on the white ...
customer_reviews.text: I think it works pretty alright the stars aren't super clear on the white setting as the other colors and it has to be kind of centered in the room to have even sized shapes around the room But i think this helps my baby know its time for bed when he sees the stars then on walls for being cheap its decent
customer_reviews.author: Mariaxdenise

customer_reviews.title: Could be cute.
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult for me to find a spot in my son's room for this to work perfectly but it was alright. He enjoyed it a few times. Unfortunately the light bulb burned out very quickly and the cord is so short I can't plug it in without an extension. Great in theory but not very practical.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: These things are amazing. I had 4 of these setup in a fellowship hall to use at decorative lighting for a banquet dinner. I like how these can be battery powered. Once I get photos I'll update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Ezekiel06

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool on ceiling
customer_reviews.text: It takes 4 AAA batteries or runs of a short USB cord. I did not like the usb cord design. Who has a usb charging port in their kids room? I wish it had a regular AC wall plug. It rotates and has many different colors. It looks really cool on ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Kate S

customer_reviews.title: does not project on walls or ceiling
customer_reviews.text: this does not project on a ceiling but more lights up like a night light. And ps! Because I wrote an honest review, the company has called me begging to take down my review! I would never recommend this product! It's very cheesy and hard to turn on and off!
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: It only works for about a month before the color lights fail.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product because my baby boy adores the stars and they keep him occupied. However, within a month of use the color lights stop working. When I bought the first time and the lights stopped working I figured we had dropped it or something - so I just bought another one. However, the second unit just died on us last night - 6 week’s after we got it. Same issue - the color lights stopped working. I won’t be buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

product_meta.title: Lizber Baby Night Light Moon Star Projector 360 Degree Rotation - 4 LED Bulbs 9 Light Color Changing with USB Cable, Unique Gifts for Men Women Kids Best Baby Gifts Ever
product_meta.description:
SPARK YOUR KID'S IMAGINATION!
Get this night light moon star projector ready for the upcoming holiday, this is the best gift EVER! Perfect for kids' bedroom, holidays decoration, parties or any occasion that you want to create romantic atmosphere. 
Let your kids be amazed by the beautiful galaxy in their room and get more closer to the moon and stars. 

Features: 
4 LED lights with multi color options
9 different color changing
Do not get warm or hot even when running all night

2 usages: 
Steady on night light 
Rotatable moon star projection lamp

3 way to turn on: 
Powered by USB cable with your own cell phone charger
Connected with computer
Used 4 AAA batteries 
(Charger and batteries are NOT included) 

3 modes: 
A mode: Steady on night light (To turn off, press A button again) 
B mode: Different color changing (Keep pressing B button until it turns off) 
C mode: Rotation switch (Press C button again to turn rotation off) 

Note:
For better projection, please remove the white dome first and use in a small, low ceiling room. 
Do not use the battery-powered and USB charging at the same time.
feature_bullets: Bring the starry sky into your home! With this baby night light projector, you and your kids will love watching the vivid, twinkling stars swirling around the room. Stars are touchable!
Tons of color options! you can choose between one or multiple colors at once, totally depends on your mood! With a 360-degree rotation feature, the stars will mesmerize people of all ages.
Comes with a removable plastic white cover, you can make it worked as a night light or turn it into a star & moon projector and have a incredible projection show.
Powered by USB cord with cell phone charger, computer, or power bank. Or operated by 4 x AAA batteries (Batteries and charger are not included).
Package includes: 1 x night light projector, 1 x USB cord, 1 x instruction, beautifully packaged for the perfect gift presentation.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars1,088 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
